Description: On October 27, 2016, Centra Health, Inc. (Centra), entered into a $137,864.68 settlement agreement with OIG. The settlement agreement resolved allegations that Centra submitted claims to Medicare for emergency ambulance transportation to destinations such as skilled nursing facilities and patient residences that should have been billed at the lower non-emergency rate.
Agency: Health & Human Services Department Office of Inspector General

Company: Centra Health Inc. and Blue Ridge Ear, Nose, Throat and Plastic Surgery, Inc.
